code: import React from'react';import'./DarkMode.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var DarkMode=function DarkMode(){var clickedClass="clicked";var body=document.body;var lightTheme="light";var darkTheme="dark";var theme;if(localStorage){theme=localStorage.getItem("theme");}if(theme===lightTheme||theme===darkTheme){body.classList.add(theme);}else{body.classList.add(darkTheme);}var switchTheme=function switchTheme(e){if(theme===darkTheme){body.classList.replace(darkTheme,lightTheme);e.target.classList.remove(clickedClass);localStorage.setItem("theme","light");theme=lightTheme;}else{body.classList.replace(lightTheme,darkTheme);e.target.classList.add(clickedClass);localStorage.setItem("theme","dark");theme=darkTheme;}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:theme==="dark"?clickedClass:"",id:"darkMode",onClick:function onClick(e){return switchTheme(e);},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-sun"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-moon"})})]})});};export default DarkMode;
